name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Better Color Picker - pick any color in Chrome

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pick any color on any webpage in your Chrome browser with a simple mouse click.

long.ar:
Introducing Better Color Picker, a top-notch tool for creative professionals! This browser extension simplifies color selection, making your design tasks smoother and more efficient.

Here's what Better Color Picker offers:

1. **Effortless Color Selection:** Say goodbye to manually picking colors. With Better Color Picker, simply hover over any element on a website to instantly identify its color.

2. **Seamless Integration:** Better Color Picker smoothly integrates with popular design tools like Adobe Photoshop and Sketch. Easily transfer your selected colors to your preferred design software.

3. **Color Format Variety:** Better Color Picker supports various color formats, including HEX, RGB, HSV, and CSS, giving you flexibility in choosing colors.

4. **Color History:** Keep track of all selected colors. This feature simplifies revisiting previous projects and maintaining design consistency.

5. **User-Friendly Interface:** Better Color Picker prioritizes user experience with its intuitive interface, suitable for designers of all skill levels.

Unlock Better Color Picker's potential and take your design projects to new heights. Try it out today!

long.pt_BR:
Apresentando o Better Color Picker, uma ferramenta de ponta para profissionais criativos! Esta extensão de navegador simplifica a seleção de cores, tornando suas tarefas de design mais suaves e eficientes.

Aqui está o que o Better Color Picker oferece:

1. **Seleção de Cores Sem Esforço:** Diga adeus à seleção manual de cores. Com o Better Color Picker, basta passar o mouse sobre qualquer elemento em um site para identificar instantaneamente sua cor.

2. **Integração Perfeita:** O Better Color Picker se integra facilmente a ferramentas de design populares como Adobe Photoshop e Sketch. Transfira facilmente suas cores selecionadas para o software de design de sua preferência.

3. **Variedade de Formatos de Cor:** O Better Color Picker suporta vários formatos de cor, incluindo HEX, RGB, HSV e CSS, oferecendo flexibilidade na escolha das cores.

4. **Histórico de Cores:** Mantenha o controle de todas as cores selecionadas. Esta funcionalidade simplifica a revisão de projetos anteriores e a manutenção da consistência do design.

5. **Interface Amigável:** O Better Color Picker prioriza a experiência do usuário com sua interface intuitiva, adequada para designers de todos os níveis de habilidade.

Desbloqueie o potencial do Better Color Picker e leve seus projetos de design a novos patamares. Experimente hoje mesmo!

long.ru:
Представляем Better Color Picker - первоклассный инструмент для творческих профессионалов! Это расширение браузера упрощает выбор цветов, делая ваши задачи по дизайну более гладкими и эффективными.

Вот что предлагает Better Color Picker:

1. **Легкий выбор цвета:** Забудьте о ручном выборе цветов. С Better Color Picker достаточно навести курсор на любой элемент на веб-сайте, чтобы мгновенно определить его цвет.

2. **Безупречная интеграция:** Better Color Picker плавно интегрируется с популярными инструментами дизайна, такими как Adobe Photoshop и Sketch. Легко передавайте выбранные цвета в выбранное вами программное обеспечение для дизайна.

3. **Разнообразие форматов цвета:** Better Color Picker поддерживает различные форматы цвета, включая HEX, RGB, HSV и CSS, что дает вам гибкость в выборе цветов.

4. **История цветов:** Ведите учет всех выбранных цветов. Эта функция упрощает возвращение к предыдущим проектам и поддержание консистентности дизайна.

5. **Пользовательский интерфейс:** Better Color Picker придает приоритет пользовательскому опыту с его интуитивным интерфейсом, подходящим для дизайнеров всех уровней.

Разблокируйте потенциал Better Color Picker и поднимите ваши дизайн-проекты на новый уровень. Попробуйте сегодня!
long.sw:
Introducing Better Color Picker, a top-notch tool for creative professionals! This browser extension simplifies color selection, making your design tasks smoother and more efficient.

Here's what Better Color Picker offers:

1. **Effortless Color Selection:** Say goodbye to manually picking colors. With Better Color Picker, simply hover over any element on a website to instantly identify its color.

2. **Seamless Integration:** Better Color Picker smoothly integrates with popular design tools like Adobe Photoshop and Sketch. Easily transfer your selected colors to your preferred design software.

3. **Color Format Variety:** Better Color Picker supports various color formats, including HEX, RGB, HSV, and CSS, giving you flexibility in choosing colors.

4. **Color History:** Keep track of all selected colors. This feature simplifies revisiting previous projects and maintaining design consistency.

5. **User-Friendly Interface:** Better Color Picker prioritizes user experience with its intuitive interface, suitable for designers of all skill levels.

Unlock Better Color Picker's potential and take your design projects to new heights. Try it out today!
